title: Mobile-Based LMS Accessibility Improvement and Microlearning Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Smartphone Usage and Mathematical Operations Comprehension
context.additional_context: A process emphasizing improved accessibility and interactivity of mathematics learning content in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify the clear location of learning materials in the LMS mobile interface.
Learners can navigate systematically organized reading lists in a smartphone environment to locate required math resources within 3 minutes.
Learners can engage in problem-solving interactions with peer learners at least once using collaborative tools within the LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
